intro: 0网才是真正由一个个对等的“人”构成的网络。I'm feeling like here is the TRUE NET OF HUMAN.

post.body:
我来到这里的原因到底是什么呢？这里很像曾经的freenet，但是freenet比这里难用多了。0net实在是个好上手的p2p网络，回这里就像回家一样！Praise the 0net!
欢迎光临！Welcome to Dalun's world ! [→](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1CouTPX7rK6cyffPCyyxttdZhB1u7NPtqz/15DiwKXyByVUtW7hWvTSuTa7FM2uLM7UV5/1535607784)

comment.body: just copy your data/users.json file to your phone. it will work
@xeu100: try "everything" developed by voidtools. If you formerly used windows, they might be in the "ZeroNet-win-dist" folder.

follow.user_name: 为啥用户名颜色无法自定义？emmmmmmm
